links.title: Apple (AAPL) Rumored to Develop Cheaper Mac External Displays
links.description: Apple's ( - Free Report) is now rumored to develop a new external display, which will be launched in 2022, at half the price of its existing Pro Display XDR, per Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, cited by 9TO5Mac.
